metadata.description: Claude Code tools and plugins by unclecode - productivity enhancers, project management utilities, and workflow automation

plugins.name: project-progress
plugins.description: Project progress tracking and checkpoint management system. Track milestones, create checkpoints, and manage project evolution with AI-optimized commands.

plugins.name: gemini-imagegen
plugins.description: Generate and edit images using the Gemini API (Nano Banana). Create images from text prompts, edit existing images, apply style transfers, generate logos, create stickers, and product mockups. Supports multi-turn refinement and composition.

plugins.name: webapp-testing
plugins.description: Test web applications using Playwright for UI verification and debugging. Automates browser testing with server lifecycle management, network idle detection, and screenshot verification. Perfect for local development testing.
